channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: The beautiful country 'just like Italy' but 7,000 miles away and with less crowds
item.description: With many places in Italy struggling with overtourism, it might be time to look for a similar alternative.
item.author: Kris Boratyn
item.media:keywords: Italy, Argentina, Overtourism, Tourism, Holiday, Italian ancestry, Italy alternatives, what countries are similar to Italy, where to go instead of Italy, countries that look like Italy, Italian heritage

media:content.media:description: There is a country 7,000 miles away from Italy that looks very similar in places.

media:thumbnail.media:description: There is a country 7,000 miles away from Italy that looks very similar in places.

item.title: Police use tear gas as tensions flare ahead of Trump's military parade
item.description: In Washington, a military parade to mark both the 250th anniversary of the US army and US President Donald Trump's birthday is about to get underway.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Military, Gas, Protests, Tear gas, Military parade

media:content.media:description: It was not immediately clear what prompted to police to fire tear gas

media:thumbnail.media:description: It was not immediately clear what prompted to police to fire tear gas

item.title: Trump sends Putin stark 5-word message as Kremlin tyrant sends 'very nice' birthday wishes
item.description: Trump turned 79 on Saturday and will attend a military parade marking the 250th anniversary of the US Army.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, USA, Donald Trump birthday, Vladimir Putin, Russia, Ukraine, Iran, Truth Social

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump talked to Putin on Saturday

media:thumbnail.media:description: Donald Trump talked to Putin on Saturday

item.title: Ibiza snake panic as six-foot reptiles invade seas around holiday island
item.description: Several holidaymakers have said they no longer feel safe swimming in the water, with one couple sharing a video of their up-close encounter while drifting in a small inflatable.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Ibiza, Environmental Issues, Animals, snakes, holidaymakers, ecological impact

media:content.media:description: The snakes can reach almost six foot in length

media:thumbnail.media:description: The snakes can reach almost six foot in length

item.title: Putin airforce humiliated as Russian pilot shoots down £15m plane in friendly fire fiasco
item.description: The incident was captured on video and shows two Russian SU-25s swooping low across the horizon, before disaster strikes.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Russia, Vladimir Putin, Russia air force, SU 25 fighter jets, Donetsk, Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky, Kremlin

media:content.media:description: Two Russian SU-25s swoop across the horizon

media:thumbnail.media:description: Two Russian SU-25s swoop across the horizon

item.title: Huge breakthrough as ancient lost world discovered under ice in Antarctica
item.description: Scientists used ice-penetrating radar to discover the hidden land deep below Antarctica's ice sheet.
item.author: Sarah Barltrop
item.media:keywords: Antarctica, evolution, ancient discovery, Antarctica discovery, durham university

media:content.media:description: An ancient world has been discovered below Antarctica

media:thumbnail.media:description: An ancient world has been discovered below Antarctica

item.title: Russian economy meltdown as petrol prices soar 18% amid staggering inflation
item.description: This surge in fuel expenses could trigger further hikes in consumer prices as petrol directly impacts the cost of transport, production and retail trade.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson
item.media:keywords: Russia, Inflation, Oil, Petrol prices, Russian economy, petrol prices, inflation, oil exports, russian petrol prices, russian economy meltdown, russian inflation, russian oil prices

media:content.media:description: Russia's economy continues to suffer as money is spent on the Ukraine war.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Russia's economy continues to suffer as money is spent on the Ukraine war.

item.title: Russian army disaster as Ukraine attack destroys whole convoy of soldiers
item.description: The convoy consisted of military trucks and buses carrying army personnel, with 20 soldiers killed in the attack.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Russia, Ukraine, Vladimir Putin, Russian army convoy Makiivka, HIMARS, Donetsk, Volodymyr Zelensky, Sumy

media:content.media:description: A bus in the convoy burns after taking a direct hit

media:thumbnail.media:description: A bus in the convoy burns after taking a direct hit

item.title: Russia reels as Ukraine wipes out drone base and hits key arms plant in lethal attacks
item.description: In a spectacular strike, Ukrainian MiG-29s targeted a Russian drone command centre deep behind enemy lines near Zaporizhzhia.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Russia, Vladimir Putin, Kremlin, Drones, Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky, Zaporizhzhia, MiG 29

media:content.media:description: Ukrainian planes bombed a Russian drone base

media:thumbnail.media:description: Ukrainian planes bombed a Russian drone base

item.title: Drunk passenger hauled off flight – as entire plane forced to disembark with her
item.description: The woman admitted to drinking six glasses of wine in the terminal while waiting for the delayed flight.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Alcohol, Real life stories, Travel (section), Drunk passenger, Delta Air Lines, in-flight alcohol consumption, passenger behaviour.

media:content.media:description: The woman ended up being removed from the plane and had to be carried through the terminal

media:thumbnail.media:description: The woman ended up being removed from the plane and had to be carried through the terminal
